name: Accounting Software
short_description:
The Accounting software is made by swindia. This software is design to make bill in a beer bar, fast food corner, restaurant. This software  is also use in sweet corners, ice-cream parlor and hotels, The owner of Cafeteria, Pizza-Hut, Pizzeria, Home Delivery Counter are also use this software for making bills.
 This Software allows making bill without KOT system and mistake. This software provide total item sale summary and daily sales summary without any burden so user can easily lee manage all record. You can maintain stock regularly and this business tension will reduce.
summary: Accounting software for hotel and restaurant
